data.actual_result: Share to channel is defaulted to the read-only channel and only changes if another valid channel is manually selected. Pressing Post will produce "Unable to share. A network error has occurred or you are not currently logged in. Launch Discord, check your network settings, and try again." error.
data.expected_result: You must select a valid share to channel, else the image cannot be posted.
data.short_description: Sharing image via Discord in a read-only channel produces "A network error has occurred".
data.steps_to_repro: - Open an image sent in a read-only channel. - Click on the top right hand corner to open the share dialogue. - Select Discord.
